sections.heading: through the Internet, defined.For purposes of sections 37-571 to 37-573, hunt through the Internet means to hunt living wildlife in real time using Internet services to remotely control actual firearms and to remotely discharge live ammunition

sections.text:
37-571.Hunt through the Internet, defined.

For purposes of sections 37-571 to 37-573, hunt through the Internet means to hunt living wildlife in real time using Internet services to remotely control actual firearms and to remotely discharge live ammunition.

SourceLaws 2007, LB504, ยง 2.
